thread.title: SME expert advice: how have we done?
thread.title_full: SME expert advice: how have we done? - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: SME expert advice: how have we done?
text: Over the past year, The Telegraph in association with Volvo Car UK has been uncovering the need-to-know questions and trending topics for SMEs in today's business world . Ranging from revealing how to recruit the best staff to the dismissal of employees , explaining exchange rates to getting your work-life balance right , our business experts have assisted a huge number of SMEs in the knowledge they need to help their business. You can still view all the articles at the Volvo SME Local Business Library but for now we'd like to know what you thought of Volvo's involvement with the content. • Don't forget to get expert advice on the right company car or your SME – just call the Volvo Car Business Centre on 0345 600 4027 or visit volvocars.co.uk Answer the series of questions below and you could win a £100 Golfbreaks voucher: Online Form - SME expert advice: how have we done?
